attributes.description: Dealer demo, Balance of 5 year / unlimited Mileage Kia warranty, Balance of 4 year / 60 000 kms Kia service plan, Safety tint,  KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership.

attributes.description:
2012 Toyota FJ Cruiser 4.0 Sport Automatic for sale. Don't miss this beautifully kept 4x4 Cruiser! Very popular and rare to find in this colour.
Car had just been serviced with the agents and comes with a set of brand new tires. Car is also fitted with a newly upgraded Amada suspension which includes new shocks!
Standard Features: ABS Brakes | Air Conditioning | Airbags | Alarm | Central Locking | Cruise Control | Hill Descent Control | Diff Lock | Electric Windows | Fog Lights | Full Spare Wheel | Power Steering | Radio/CD | Rear Windshield Defroster and much more.
Car comes with full service history, books and spare keys.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.
